entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 40%
